thread.title: New international trainers to embrace new Aussie Specialist ProgramTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: New international trainers to embrace new Aussie Specialist ProgramTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: New international trainers to embrace new Aussie Specialist ProgramTravelandtourworld.com
text:
New international trainers to embrace new Aussie Specialist Program Published  
A newly recruited team of international trainers have been brought together last week for the roll out of the all new Aussie Specialist Program by Tourism Australia and its State and Territory partners.The trainers will play a vital role in engaging and upskilling frontline travel sellers in Australia’s key international markets to promote and sell Australia more effectively. The trainers underwent in-depth training in Sydney.
The Aussie Specialist Program is Tourism Australia’s global online training program. It has been designed to provide frontline travel sellers from around the globe with the knowledge and skills to best sell Australia and shared by all eight state and territory tourism partners.
The website has also undergone a major upgrade with new training modules and interactive features and has so far rolled out in the UK and North America with other markets to follow over coming months.
